title: Fix login button styling on mobile
description: The login button is misaligned on screens smaller than 480px.

title: Implement new dashboard chart
description: Add the trend line chart for concurrent tasks to the main dashboard view.

title: API endpoint for user profiles is slow
description: The /api/users/:id endpoint is taking over 2 seconds to respond.

title: Update footer copyright year
description: The copyright year in the footer is outdated and needs to be updated to the current year.

title: Verify user email on signup
description: The user successfully signs up but their account should be in a pending state until they verify their email address.
